wikipedia_page.main: Sir Charles Gibson Connell WS FRSE LLD FRZSS (11 March 1899 – 26 February 1986) was a Scottish advocate and ornithologist. He was founder and President of the Scottish Wildlife Trust.

response: *Charles Gibson Connell. For political services in Scotland.
